TALESS Hello blank fragment Welcome to Cocktails Title This is a fake description. Simulating lots of words rather than just one Try "Gin", "Bourbon", "Daiquiri".. Image of the cocktail Button with heart. Adds recipe to favorites favorites_Image favorites_Image gr ml oz tsp tbsp

System (Default)
//Headings Welcome to TALESS Find your favorites Converter Enjoy
//Description A place to explore cocktails for all tastes An extensive catalogue, guaranteed to find something you will love We make your life easier converting between values Enjoy responsibly, DON\'T drink and drive
Ingredients Calories Prep time Preparation 1.Add the gin, lemon juice, maraschino liqueur, and creme de violette to a cocktail shaker. Fill it with ice and shake it for 30sec.\n2.Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with a Luxardo cherry, if desired. Timer 1 ounce\n2 ounces\n3 something Vodka something alcohol even more alcohol Tales For Males
//Intro Description Title Get started Skip Intro_next_imageButton Settings Search_imageButton "2 ".5", "2/3", "1/8"
//Converter Unit Converter To From Clear Results will be printed here Enter Here
Intro Image
Animation image for stir or shake Add this recipe to your favorites
//Settings The app Frequently Asked Questions The team The name came as a use of the word \"tales\" that you can hear when you say \"Cocktails\" and also because after drinking some Cocktails \"ta less\". In Greek that means that you talk about stuff :). Why is the name \'TALESS\'? How long did it take to develop TALESS? It took some amount of time and the extension may or may not have helped, who knows
The Team Antonios Papavasileiou The man with the plan. He wanted to create an AI by doing if else statements so deep you\'d probably find diamonds. Instead he spent his week writing SQL inserts for this app. The design and the team have no one else to thank but him. Alket Saliaj Quite the mystery this man. He speak little, codes a lot. He creates Java but surprisingly, doesn\'t drink it. He prefers Gin and Juice like a true gentleman. Elias Kodoulas A visionary. Dude writes java as good as the one he drinks. Developing is to him like photosynthesizing is to plants. He likes bolognese a little too much.
Elias Kodoulas image Alket Saliaj image Antonios Papavasileiou image Long press to restart the timer.
